body.name: Veken Non-Electric Self-Cleaning Dual Nozzle (Frontal/Feminine Wash), Fresh Spray Bidet for Toilet with Adjustable Water Pressure Switch
features: 【2 year limited warranty】We are confident in the quality of our products. That is why our bidets come with a 2 year warranty. In 2023, we strengthened product quality controls. If you do encounter any issues though, please contact us through the Amazon platform. Our customer service team are ready to help, day and night.

【Dual nozzle spray options】Bidet toilet seat attachment has 2 options, first is posterior wash, which can be used for thorough cleaning. Second is feminine wash which is specially designed for women during their period and also great for pregnant mothers.

【Nozzle self-cleaning】The bidet sprayer for toilet is a convenient and hygienic way to wash your private parts. The unique nozzle self-cleaning function is designed to shield and protect your skin with every use. The nozzle can be cleaned before and after each use of the bidet.

【Adjustable water pressure】The water pressure control and cleaning mode of our bidet attachment for toilet can be adjusted separately. It is convenient for the elderly and children to use it. Just control the knob to adjust the pressure of water flow.

【High quality】The t-valve and water supply inlet are made of high quality stainless steel instead of the typical plastic. This toilet bidet comes with the necessary accessories to get your bidet up and running in minutes. Detailed instructions makes the assembly extremely interesting and hassle-free. All you have to do is ensure proper measurement.
body.description: What you will get? 1 x Veken Cold Water Bidet 1 x Assembly Instruction 1 x Stainless Steel T-connector (7/8 x 7/8 x 3/8 inches ) 1 x Cold Water Stainless Steel Flexible Hose (2.46 feet) 2 x Circular Attachment Plates With Rubber Gaskets

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Veken non-electric bidet is a convenient and hygienic way to clean your private parts. Enjoy a toilet bidet that will never leave you disappointed!

Ideal choice for family More hygienic than paper wiping Makes cleaning during menstruation easier and ideal for female. Allows seniors to easily operate Simple knob design allows seniors to easily operate without instructions. Convenient for pregnant women No need to bend for wiping, simply twist the knob and enjoy a soft rinse.

Sophisticated and detailed design ensures quality Dual nozzle design Bidet wash is suitable for washing the butt after pooping. Female cleaning is specially designed for women cleaning private zones, it is convenient for pregnant or menstruating women. Nozzle cleaning The nozzle guard gate shields the nozzle and ensures the bidet is always ready for a clean operation. The bidet sprayer for toilet also features a nozzle cleaning mode to thoroughly clean and rinse the nozzle. Stainless steel water inlet Instead of a plastic water inlet, this bidet attachment is equipped with a stainless steel water inlet, which is compatible with stainless steel hoses and reduces the risk of product wear and water leakage.

A practical gift The bathroom is the place where you start and end each day. Veken Bidet - an affordable way for you to get comfortable and convenient cleansing, the best gift for friends and family. What you will get? 1 x Veken Cold Water Bidet 1 x Assembly Instruction 1 x Stainless Steel T-connector (7/8 x 7/8 x 3/8 inches ) 1 x Cold Water Stainless Steel Flexible Hose (2.46 feet) 2 x Circular Attachment Plates With Rubber Gaskets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After spinal fusion surgery, toileting has become a big problem for me.
reviews.reviewText: This bidet gave me a new lease on my toileting life! It really helps me keep clean. Of course, during winter in the Western NC mountains, the first shot of cold water is an attention getter, but then all is well. Works well and was easy for my husband to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this right before my double carpal tunnel surgery, and what a life saver !!!! I’ve never used one so I have nothing to compare it to , but it did exactly what I needed it to do lol easy set up and easy to use once you learn it and get ur settings just right! I’ll never not have one now .

reviews.reviewerName: Missouri girl in a  New Jersey world
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Husbands Review: Started to leak around the valve just after the two year warranty. We have three of these and two were out of warranty. Just ordered another one to replace the leaking one (can't believe how the price has gone up after two years) as we want the same units in all bathrooms for convenience. The units work well and we like them (except for the one that started leaking). Hopefully there will be no more leaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heck of a good decision
reviews.reviewText: I bought this when my toilet started having leaking issues and I was rehauling the whole thing. There was a deal and I got it for a good price and honestly installation took all of 10 minutes. I for sure thought that the cold was going to be the worst thing ever and I was going to hate it but I got it for my husband and honestly I love it. The cold is barely noticeable it's a little bit of a ohh moment and that's it. We've had it for 2 months now and it's had no issues a lot of reviews have said that there's leakage at this point and we are free and clear thus far. We also check and make sure everything is staying appropriately seal and situated correctly every couple of days because I'm paranoid. It's so easy to use that all three of my children use it and we've had a massive decrease in toilet paper which being a family of five we went through a lot. I used to have to buy toilet paper every week and now I'm buying it every 3 weeks. For information purposes I have no storage in my house so I can't bulk buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for the price. Definitely makes me feel more clean that toilet paper/wet wipes. Great budget bidet. Also REALLY EASY to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An inexpensive way to get the hygiene you need
reviews.reviewText: Europe has used the bidet even before they developed the toilet! Once you use it, you'll wonder how you ever got clean "down there" without it. Plus it saves a lot on toilet paper, as you will discover.This is a current model of an old one I had from the same company. The previous one lasted 7 years. It began leaking around the control panel and I could not find a replacement feed line anywhere as the gasket used was fused onto the feed line.I've used this newer model for several months now and it operates every bit as well as the original. It does have two "modes" one that supposedly sprays the water further toward the front of you (I suppose for the ladies) and the other which is directed directly at your bottom. There is also a knob to adjust the water pressure.This beats paying hundreds of dollars to install a real Bidet, or paying over $100 for a complete bidet toilet seat. The water is NOT heated, but that's not a problem where we live in south Texas as ever the cold water is usually warm due to the heat here 9 months of the year.So far, no leaks or problems and I expect to get another 7 or maybe more years from this model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low water pressure?
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got this to replace an old one that developed low water pressure. As I was testing it out, it also developed soon after testing low water pressure.The old T valve washer had disintegrated and clogged up the old bidet as well as this new bidet!I replaced the T valve washer, flushed out any in the lines and tried again. No joy.I ended up flipping it over and looked inside the bidet water inlet and saw that there were some broken pieces of the old washer blocking it!After removing it with a narrow screw driver, it worked like a charm after reinstalling it.Double check to make sure the water inlet isn’t blocked! Doesn’t take much to block it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Complete junk! Had two flood my bathrooms!
reviews.reviewText: My experience with the Veken Bidet Attachment has been nothing short of a plumbing nightmare. What was promised as a convenient addition to my bathroom turned into a watery disaster.Upon installation, the bidet seemed promising with its adjustable pressure control. However, the reality was far from what I expected. The supposed "self-cleaning" feature turned out to be a facade, as the nozzles were prone to clogging, leading to unsanitary conditions.Moreover, the bidet's "non-electric" claim should come with a warning. The water temperature was absolutely frigid, providing a shocking surprise each time I attempted to use it. It was less of a refreshing cleanse and more of an Arctic plunge.Worst of all, within days of installation, the bidet attachment began leaking profusely, causing water to pool around the base of the toilet. It felt like Niagara Falls decided to relocate to my bathroom! Not only did this create a mess, but it also risked damaging my flooring.The "feminine wash" nozzle, touted for its specialized functionality, was anything but gentle. Instead of a gentle spray, it felt like a high-pressure hose, leaving me feeling more uncomfortable than before.To add insult to injury, customer support was virtually non-existent. Attempts to reach out for assistance were met with silence, leaving me stranded with a malfunctioning bidet.In conclusion, the Veken Bidet Attachment was a catastrophic addition to my bathroom experience. From its faulty design leading to leaks and poor functionality to the bone-chilling water temperature and lackluster customer service, this product has been nothing short of a plumbing nightmare.
This bidet was simple to install and works as expected. We would not go back. Definitely more hygienic.
